creator: mcfarto@gmail.com
text:
After generating an .xls file using POI 3.6, when i try to open it i get an error message that says something like "Errors have been detected in the file but it could be opened doing the following repairs:
One or more invalid names have been removed" 

I dont know the exact words in english because my excel is in spanish.

After prompting me with this warning it lets me view the file correctly. If I save the file i dont get this warning again.

If opened with later versions of Microsoft Office it wont show the warning, and if saved with these later versions and then opened with Microsoft Excel 2003 it wont show it either.

Excuse me if my english is a bit poor.

Thanks in advance.

creator: yegor@dinom.ru
text:
Try the latest build from trunk. Daily builds can be downloaded from here:
 http://encore.torchbox.com/poi-cvs-build/ 

If the problem is still there, please post full sample code to reproduce it.

Yegor

creator: mcfarto@gmail.com
text:
We tried to use the latest version and it didnt work.

I have attached the source we use to generate this files.

Thanks,

Diego.

creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at
text: It has been a long time since anybody did take a look at this issue, is this still a problem for you with the latest version of Apache POI?

Very long time without progress here, there were many changes which likely fixed this problem already. Also the attached test-case is very elaborate, making it very hard to reproduce the problem.

If this is still a problem for you, then please reopen the issue with a test-case that is reduced to the bare minimum while still showing the problem.
creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at
